name: indexchat
description: Local RAG system for PDF documents

scripts.setup: npm run install:python && npm run install:subdirs
scripts.install:python: cd indexer && python3 -m venv venv && ./venv/bin/pip install --no-user -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:subdirs: cd server && npm install && cd ../ui && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n watcher,server,ui -c blue,green,magenta "npm run watcher" "npm run server" "npm run ui"
